channel.title: 浮生随想
channel.description: Recent content on 浮生随想

item.title: The Most Boring Person - Immanuel Kant
item.description: - He woke up every morning at 5:00 AM - Write for exactly three hours - Lecture at the same university for exactly four hours - Lunch at the same restaurant - Walk through the same park on the same route - Go to bed at exactly 10:00 PM - Live his entire life in konigsberg, east of Prussia “Act that you use humanity, whether is your own person or in the person of any other, always at the same time as an end, never merely as a means.
